body:
depends on PR #28623

Following the commits from the PR #28623, all the packages depending upon boost have been replaced with  Boost.with_default_variants. This commit removes the Boost.with_default_variants to variants that packages are precisely dependent upon through build analysis conducted under @trws. This is the first batch of 20 packages with updated boost dependencies.

The focus of this PR is only the final commit (fe4e266) as the rest are part of #28623
title: Feature/composed boost pkg deps p1
